headline.main: Premier Li Says China Will Resolutely Oppose Taiwan Independence
headline.print_headline: Premier Li Says China Will Resolutely Oppose Taiwan Independence

lead_paragraph: China will resolutely oppose and contain Taiwan independence, Premier Li Keqiang said in remarks prepared for delivery at the opening of the annual meeting of parliament on Sunday, amid heightened tension between Beijing and the self-ruled island.
snippet: China will resolutely oppose and contain Taiwan independence, Premier Li Keqiang said in remarks prepared for delivery at the opening of the annual meeting of parliament on Sunday, amid heightened tension between Beijing and the self-ruled island....
